block.p: We knew the Rocket eBook would be a hit in our library when I took one to an Internet class attended by senior citizens. To a person, they adored this device. The large print and the backlighting make it easy to read. The slight warmth of the internal battery and the grainy surface make it quite a cozy little reading machine.

Novelists like Annie Proulx may have been suspicious of ''a twitchy little screen,'' but the popular vote says otherwise. Our library owns two Rocket eBooks, both are checked out and 16 people are lined up on the reserve lists.
